alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:59PM CDT until July 01 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Northern Washington County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Franklin County in east central Missouri... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 259 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Leasburg to near Anthonies Mill to 6 miles north of Courtois, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Union, Sullivan, Pacific, St. Clair, Hillsboro, Villa Ridge, Cedar Hill, Anthonies Mill, Parkway, Cedar Hill Lakes, Miramiguoa Park, Richwoods, Dittmer, Lonedell, Scotsdale, Stanton, Morse Mill, Oermann, Robertsville, and Catawissa. This includes Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 225 and 251. This also includes Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site, Robertsville State Park, and Meramec State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
